topic.title: Favorite topics and subcategories function
topic.body:
ZeroTalk needs a function that makes possible to favorite/un-favorite a subcategory or a topic, showing them up than the others.

It would be very useful!

19_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8.body:
You can't find them 'cause are Base64 images.

Here is the compass icon code, for example:
data:image/png;base64,

14_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8.body: You can import a CSS file into an other CSS file with the '@import' directive.

9_1LRrd96P7FiTcsyNXVzPM5jtpQoH1B4gYf.body: Hey man, nice start! If you need a hand, 0Mail me at rinodrummer

1_17rxDp8LuLJo3TrKqC19FE41D98sDriyMQ.body:
> [thisguy1337](#comment_32_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao): I'm not sure what you're meaning but on the top right there is a Follow in NewsFeed option that allows you to follow discussions, topics, subtopics, blogs, and comments.
> Updates to followed items will appear on the right side of your main Zeronet page: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/

I know that I can follow topics, categories, etc. but following them can be very "spammy" (any new content'll be sent to me).

I mean a notify-less system, something that makes only show your favorite element upper.

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body:
I created my homepage at http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HDwVpBdKbn9T8nsxyrdbJfPupGCe6kmFM/

I'm a web developer and I created my page to publish future projects based on ZeroNet.
